member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Framework.Controllers.Generated.ALinkBoxDataController.AptifyGeneratedEntryMethod_LinkBoxData_PerformSearch
member.summary: This method is used to performs a search for a link box.This can either go against an entire search configuration or an explicit list of entities.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Framework.Controllers.Generated.ALinkBoxDataController.AptifyGeneratedEntryMethod_LinkBoxData_AdvancedSearch
member.summary: This method is used to performs a advance search data.

member.name: M:Aptify.Services.Framework.Controllers.Generated.ALinkBoxDataController.AptifyGeneratedEntryMethod_LinkBoxData_GetSearchConfiguration(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to retrieves the search configuration data as JSON.
member.param: The name of the configuration requested.
